definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: Shaoxing opera genres are a typical character of the most distinctive local drama besides Peking opera.
sentences.chinese: 越剧流派是继京剧之后最具特色的一个地方剧种。

sentences.english: That also explains why Shaoxing opera fans are mostly women.
sentences.chinese: 所以就说越剧的观众为什么是女性居多呢？

sentences.english: From then on, an all-women cast became a signature of Shaoxing Opera.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，全女班表演成为了越剧的特征。

sentences.english: The goal is must prosper the Shaoxing opera.
Yue Opera, which is popular in South China today, has been performed since 1900.
sentences.chinese: 越剧可溯源到二十世纪初，至今尚在中国南方盛行。

definition: Kunqu opera, influential musical theater originating in Kunshan, Jiangsu province in Yuan times
opera highlights performed as independent pieces
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
ballad tune in southern dialects, usually to sanxian 三弦 or pipa 琵琶 accompaniment
